name: M.R.S.
description:
Founded in 1979, M.R.S.'s mission is to provide specialized IT Professional Services and Business Software Solutions to help our customers meet their business objectives.
M.R.S. provides end-to end Software Development and systems Integrations services built on IBM and Microsoft technologies. Focus areas include: Microsoft SharePoint & Technology Practice, IBM WebSphere & Technology Practice, Business Intelligence Practice, Project Management Practice. Through its "Software Solutions Business Practice", M.R.S. has developed proprietary e-commerce, Business Intelligence and Fixed Assets Management solutions that deliver exceptional results to industry.
Leading companies such as MCAP, United Way of Greater Toronto, D&B, CMA, Staples, Fisher Scientific, CIBC, Merit and MDS have made M.R.S. their firm of choice to Make IT work for them.
